text: Nushi wa kare-ra (no inori) o kikiire rare,(ōse rareta). `Hontōni ware wa, anata gata no dare no hataraita hataraki mo muda ni shinaidearou. Otoko demo on'na demo, anata gata wa tagaini dōshidearu. Sorede ijū shita mono, furusato kara tsuihō sa reta mono, waga michi no tame ni hakugai sa re, mata funsen shite satsugai sa reta mono ni wa, ware wa kitto kare-ra kara subete no zaigō o shōmetsu shite, kawa ga shita o nagareru rakuen ni haira seyou.' Koreha arrā no omoto kara no hōshōdearu. Arrā no omoto ni koso, mottomo sugureta hōshō ga aru
